text: لِيَكْفُرُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know.
translation.id.indonesian: agar mereka mengingkari nikmat yang telah Kami berikan kepada mereka dan agar mereka (hidup) bersenang-senang (dalam kekafiran). Kelak mereka akan mengetahui (akibat perbuatannya).
